content: free pattern - f36 camote pocket scarf by cassandra milani all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 11/24/20 © fairmount fibers ltd 2013 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 3 free pattern - f36 size abbreviations finished length 64 co cast on width 7 k knit k2tog knit 2 sts together materials m1l insert left needle from front to back under strand manos del uruguay maxima 100% merino wool ap- of yarn which runs between next stitch on left needle prox 100g/219 yds 3 skip shown in #2183 sweet potato and last stitch on right needle knit this stitch through back loop us 8/5mm needles 12 straight or size to obtain gauge m1r insert left needle from back to front under strand darning needle of yarn which runs between next stitch on left needle stitch markers and last stitch on right needle knit this stitch through gauge front loop 20 sts and 32 row = 4 in double moss stitch blocked p purl 19 sts and 36 row = 4 in garter stitch blocked st s stitch es notes stitch guide this scarf is knit in garter stitch with double moss ac- double moss stitch multiples of 2 cents and has a pocket at each end for warmth or stor- row 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end age wear it draped or wrap it once around your neck row 2 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end for those chilly fall days row 3 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end row 4 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end repeat these 4 row for double moss stitch garter stitch any number of sts row 1 knit repeat this row for garter stitch all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 11/24/20 © fairmount fibers ltd 2013 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 3 free pattern - f36 instructions row 62 k8 m1r 4 times k8 m1l 3 times k9 72 sts leaving a 15 tail to stitch pocket together co 72 sts work in double moss stitch for 6 place stitch markers place stitch markers at beginning and end of last row to at beginning and end of last row to show end of pocket show beginning of pocket seam work in double moss seam stitch for 6 from last markers bind off all stitches cut yarn leaving 15 tail to stitch pockets begin decreases finishing row 1 k8 k2tog k7 k2tog 6 times k8 65 sts lay scarf flat on each end of scarf fold in extended row 2 k5 k2tog k51 k2tog k5 63 sts double moss stitch pieces so that the stitch markers row 3 through 6 knit meet using tail thread from co mattress stitch from row 7 k5 k2tog k to last 7 sts k2tog k5 61 sts co row to stitch-marked row
